original_title: KFC Burger Feast with Supercharged Sauce
overview: Mike Mazowski is a vigilante on a mission to kill the last of the offenders. The challenges ramp up as he goes on his journey to find the anonymous criminal known as The Big Offender, the most dangerous man in the city. After acquiring the information he needed from Jake Hall, The Big Offender’s right hand man, it’s time for Mike to enact justice once and for all.
tagline: Say hello to your 9 year old daughter for me
title: KFC Burger Feast with Supercharged Sauce
